content: serpent horns 4 5mm hook - worsted weight yarn - color of choice worked in the round 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2-10 increase single_crochet into the rest you will increase one in each round working from 7sc to 15sc 11-20 *increase single_crochet decrease single_crochet* repeat between ** two times 10r of 15 21-22 single_crochet around 2r of 15 slip_stitch into next fo leave tail for sewing stuff sew to the head or back of your monster/creature with the tails weave in ends
